mapper.select: SELECT ts.schedule_id, tp.trip_id, tp.username, tp.place, tp.settings, ts.start_ymd AS date, 'start' AS date_type, ts.activity_order, ts.activity_type, ts.activity_name, ts.activity_address, ts.activity_image_url, a.name AS accommodation_name, a.address AS accommodation_address, a.image_url AS accommodation_image_url FROM trip_plan tp INNER JOIN trip_schedule ts ON tp.trip_id = ts.trip_id LEFT JOIN accommodation a ON tp.username = a.username AND a.date = ts.start_ymd WHERE tp.username = #{username} AND ts.start_ymd IS NOT NULL AND ts.start_ymd != '' UNION ALL SELECT ts.schedule_id, tp.trip_id, tp.username, tp.place, tp.settings, ts.end_ymd AS date, 'end' AS date_type, ts.activity_order, ts.activity_type, ts.activity_name, ts.activity_address, ts.activity_image_url, a.name AS accommodation_name, a.address AS accommodation_address, a.image_url AS accommodation_image_url FROM trip_plan tp INNER JOIN trip_schedule ts ON tp.trip_id = ts.trip_id LEFT JOIN accommodation a ON tp.username = a.username AND a.date = ts.end_ymd WHERE tp.username = #{username} AND ts.end_ymd IS NOT NULL AND ts.end_ymd != '' ORDER BY date, activity_order;
